input.sentences: the man watched over the boy while the mom played .
the chicken was cooking on the grill in the interim .
the children played with paddles and balls .
some of the children decided to ride the wheel .
when the wheel appeared to be fun | another child joined .
output.sentences: A mom watched as her son played with the other children outside.
Her gaze flicked to her husband flipping burgers at the grill.
The children continued to play amongst the drifting aroma from the grill.
They continued their joy filled ride of playful fun.
And the parents looked on, enjoying their happy smiles.
